page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Most people who live here are either farmers, farm workers or in related actvities such as contracting or forestry. Many of the small farmers will farm and contract for other farmers. Others are farming and doing part time work elsewhere in tourist activities or using other skills working from home or in nearby towns. One of the biggest farmers puts his land to arable so that he can concentrate on running an agricultural machinery business. Bodmin and Liskeard are the main areas of employment outside the area.
